30 typedef int LONG;
31 typedef unsigned char BYTE;
32 typedef unsigned int DWORD;

35 struct BITMAPFILEHEADER
36 {

38  uint bfSize;

40  uint bfOffBits;
41 };
42 
43 struct BITMAPINFOHEADER
44 {
45  uint biSize;
46  int biWidth;
47  int biHeight;
48  short biPlanes;
49  short biBitCount;
50  uint biCompression;
51  uint biSizeImage;

53  int biYPelsPerMeter;
54  uint biClrUsed;
55  uint biClrImportant;
56 };
57 
58 struct RGBQUAD
59 {
60  unsigned char rgbBlue;
61  unsigned char rgbGreen;
62  unsigned char rgbRed;
63  unsigned char rgbReserved;
64 };
65 
66 struct BITMAPINFO
67 {
68  BITMAPINFOHEADER bmiHeader;
69  RGBQUAD bmiColors[256];
70 };
